title: Thumb Commander Legacy: Vega Campaign
description: Fight the Kilrathi Empire as a rookie pilot aboard the TCS Tiger's Claw in humanity's darkest hour.
intro: 2654. The Kilrathi Empire invades human space. You're a rookie pilot on the TCS Tiger's Claw under Colonel Halcyon. Fight across the Vega Sector against overwhelming odds. The Kilrathi show no mercy - neither can you.
outro: Victory! The Kilrathi fleet is broken and their advance halted. You've saved countless lives and bought the Confederation time. But the war continues. Greater challenges await.

missions.name: First Blood
missions.briefing: First mission, pilot. Small Kilrathi patrol in Gimle system. Seek and destroy. You fly with Paladin. Follow his lead and remember your training.
missions.debriefing: Good work, rookie. You showed good instincts. Those scouts were gathering intel on our shipping lanes. You've bought us time.

missions.name: Asteroid Run
missions.briefing: Freighter trapped in McAuliffe asteroid field. Medical supplies on board. Navigate the field and escort to safety. Asteroids kill as surely as Kilrathi.
missions.debriefing: Excellent flying! The medical supplies will save lives at the front. Your navigation skills are impressive for a rookie.

missions.name: Kilrathi Patrol
missions.briefing: Full Kilrathi squadron spotted in Dakota system near the jump point. You and Spirit fly search and destroy. Expect heavy resistance.
missions.debriefing: Impressive! Full squadron eliminated. Intel from the wreckage suggests they were preparing something big. Command is analyzing the data.

missions.name: Supply Run Defense
missions.briefing: Critical convoy moving through Venice system. Kilrathi fighters moving to intercept. Escort convoy through danger zone. Ships are unarmed.
missions.debriefing: Convoy safe. The supplies will keep our fighters flying. Command noted your dedication to protecting civilians.

missions.name: Recon Strike
missions.briefing: Kilrathi listening post in Rostov system monitoring our fleet movements. Destroy the post and defenders. Critical strike mission.
missions.debriefing: Mission accomplished! Listening post destroyed, intelligence network disrupted. Data cores contain valuable enemy fleet info.

missions.name: Desperate Defense
missions.briefing: Red alert! Massive Kilrathi fleet hitting Firekka system. Evacuation underway. Hold the line at all costs. All fighters scrambled.
missions.debriefing: Against all odds, you held! Evacuation successful, thousands saved. The Kilrathi paid dearly but they'll be back.

missions.name: Behind Enemy Lines
missions.briefing: Major Kilrathi supply depot in Nephele system. Deep in enemy territory, heavily defended. Solo mission. Get in, destroy depot, get out.
missions.debriefing: Incredible! Single-handed destruction of their primary depot. Explosion visible from three systems. Cripples enemy ops for months.

missions.name: The Gauntlet
missions.briefing: Kilrathi blockade in Vega system. Minefields and patrols. Clear path for our fleet to reach final battle. Entire defense network will try to stop you.
missions.debriefing: You did it! Path clear, fleet moving through. Kilrathi blockade shattered. Prepare for final battle - humanity's fate hangs in balance.

missions.name: Final Assault
missions.briefing: Final battle for Vega Sector. Kilrathi flagship and battle group making last stand. Target the flagship. Destroy it and enemy fleet scatters.
missions.debriefing: VICTORY! Kilrathi flagship destroyed, fleet in retreat! You've broken their invasion force. Vega Sector safe. You're a hero of the Confederation.
